scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/minijasminenode2 test.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js --debug --outfile dist/foo.js --standalone foo && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/foo.js --output dist/foo.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run cover && npm run bench && npm run dist
